page.title: 02DUNTOCHER AND HARDGATE GALA
page.content:
In the first week in June every year the Duntocher and Hardgate Gala takes place.
During the preceding week a gala queen is chosen from one of the local primary schools and she heads the procession on the gala day followed by colourful floats and a lively procession of young and old alike.The parade arrives at Fore Park where there are such events as B.M.X. riders,majorettes,highland dancers,a bugle band and many side shows.
To round off the day a Gala Dance is held in the Glenhead C.E. Centre from 8 p.m. till midnight to celebrate another successful Gala Day.
